article.title: MDA Award $120 Million Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Missile Defense Agency is announcing the award of a contract ceiling increase of $120 million to Raytheon Missile Systems, Tucson, Arizona, increasing the total contract value from $688,966,325 to $808,966,325.Â Under this modification, the contractor will continue to provide SM-3 design and engineering, in-service engineering support, production engineering and obsolescence, surveillance and flight test support, and transition to production.
